Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Manasa eva pashyanti

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Aham brahmasmi

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Yogah karmasu kaushalam
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Aham brahmasmi

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Aham brahmasmi
Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Manasa eva pashyanti
Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Aham brahmasmi
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Aham brahmasmi
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Aham brahmasmi
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Manasa eva pashyanti

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Aham brahmasmi

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Aham brahmasmi
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Manasa eva pashyanti

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Aham brahmasmi
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Aham brahmasmi

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Manasa eva pashyanti
Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Aham brahmasmi

Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Aham brahmasmi
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Manasa eva pashyanti

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Yogah karmasu kaushalam
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Yogah karmasu kaushalam
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Manasa eva pashyanti
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Ati sarvatra varjayet

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Manasa eva pashyanti

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Ati sarvatra varjayet

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Yogah karmasu kaushalam
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Aham brahmasmi
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Aham brahmasmi

Manasa eva pashyanti
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah

Yogah karmasu kaushalam
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Aham brahmasmi

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Aham brahmasmi

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Manasa eva pashyanti

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Manasa eva pashyanti

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Aham brahmasmi
Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Aham brahmasmi
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Manasa eva pashyanti

Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Manasa eva pashyanti

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Manasa eva pashyanti
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Yogah karmasu kaushalam
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Aham brahmasmi

Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Aham brahmasmi
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Manasa eva pashyanti

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Manasa eva pashyanti
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Aham brahmasmi
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Aham brahmasmi
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Manasa eva pashyanti
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Aham brahmasmi

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Ati sarvatra varjayet

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Aham brahmasmi

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Aham brahmasmi

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Manasa eva pashyanti

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Manasa eva pashyanti

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Manasa eva pashyanti
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Manasa eva pashyanti

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Manasa eva pashyanti
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Aham brahmasmi
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Manasa eva pashyanti

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Aham brahmasmi

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Manasa eva pashyanti

Ati sarvatra varjayet

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Shaantim icchanti jantavah
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Vidyaa dadaati vinayam

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Aham brahmasmi

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Manasa eva pashyanti
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Yogah karmasu kaushalam

Aham brahmasmi

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam
Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Manasa eva pashyanti
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Manasa eva pashyanti

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Vinaashkaale vipareet buddhi

Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Vinayaat yaati paatrataam
Kshamaa veerasya bhooshanam

Aham brahmasmi
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Aham brahmasmi

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah
Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Manasa eva pashyanti

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Vinayaat yaati paatrataam

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Ati sarvatra varjayet

Yogah karmasu kaushalam
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya

Yogah karmasu kaushalam
Satyam eva jayate na anritam

Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya
Tamaso maa jyotir gamaya

Ati sarvatra varjayet
Aham brahmasmi

Yatha chaturango raaja mantri janasya cha balasya
Manasa eva pashyanti

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Aham brahmasmi

Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Shreyo hi jnaanam abhyasaat jnaanaat dhyaanam vishishyate

Naasti buddhir ayuktasya, na cha ayuktasya bhaavanaa

Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana

Karmanye vadhikaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana
Na cha abhaavayatah shaantir ashaantasya kutah sukham

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Udyamam saahasam dhairyam buddhih shaktih paraakramah

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Aham brahmasmi

Manasa eva pashyanti
Dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakshati rakshitah

Satyam eva jayate na anritam
Shaantim icchanti jantavah

Vidyaa dadaati vinayam
Ati sarvatra varjayet

Manasa eva pashyanti
Manasa eva pashyanti

Na hi kalyanakrit kashchid durgatim taata gacchati
Anityam asukham lokam imam praapya bhajasva maam
